titles.title: Future Card Buddyfight 100
フューチャーカード バディファイト100
未来卡 搭档对战 100

anime.description: While http://anidb.net/ch61172 [Tasuku] is off training and getting rest in the world of the monsters, the Buddy Police sees the need to deputize some of the champions to help protect the Earth. http://anidb.net/ch61174 [Gaou], http://anidb.net/ch62609 [Tetsuya], and http://anidb.net/ch65061 [Kisaragi Zan`ya] are among those deputized, and it`s just in time: a new enemy named Ikazuchi arrives with the deadly 100 demons, all rogue monsters. Now the champions and the Great 8 monsters must fight to protect the Earth from being consumed by these new rogues. Source: ANN

externalentity.identifier: フューチャーカード_バディファイト

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: new
tag.description: Not based on anything, the story is a new work, usually made up by the people involved in creating the anime. Generally if an original work (原作) credit is given, it will be to the studio, or director, or other members of the production team.

episode.title: とてつもない脅威!
An Overwhelming Threat!
Totetsumonai Kyoui!
episode.summary: The Buddy Police are on red alert when an illegal monster visits earth! Commander I sends in a surprising new member of the force to back up Takihara. And just when things seem under control, the planet falls under an overwhelming threat. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 風雲! バディフェスタ!!
Trouble at Buddy Fest!
Fuuun! Buddy Fest!!
episode.summary: Commander I gives Gao some time off, so he goes to check out the Buddy Fest. The Castle Store manager asks Gao to help him train some newbie Buddyfighters. But Shido breaks up the fun, forcing Gao into action, when he releases one of the hundred demons. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 太陽を嫌う者
Those Who Hate the Sun!
Taiyou o Kiraumono
episode.summary: The gang thinks they’ve figured out who the mysterious Death Shido is. Gao meets a senior member of the Buddy Police who questions his ability to be a good officer. But the young fighter has a chance to prove himself in another match against Death Shido. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 百鬼襲来! 天武を守れ!!
The Hundred Demons Attack! Protect Tenbu!
Hyaku Oni Shuurai! Tenbu o Mamore!
episode.summary: Gao’s finding it hard to juggle his duties as a Buddy Police Trainee and a full time student, especially when he has to leave in the middle of class to chase down an illegal monster who’s stolen his friends’ Buddyfight card decks. And who is Death Shido?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 不眠不休! バディポリス見習い!!
The Life of a Buddy Police Trainee!
Fumin Fukyuu! Buddy Police Minarai!!
episode.summary: An illegal monster is consuming all of Chotokyo’s food, and Gao is sent into the line of fire. But when he and Drum have nothing left to give, a surprising Buddyfighter steps in to try and save Tenbu from Death Shido and his latest Hundred Demon! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 兄弟対決! 斬夜VS超合竜ブレンバルティス!!
Brothers in Arms! The Battle of Dragon Brainbaltes!
Kyoudai Taiketsu! Kiyoru vs Chougouryuu Brainbaltes!!
episode.summary: When a criminal fighter appears with an ultimatum and a tag team of hundred demons, Zanya is forced to step in when no one else comes forward to help. And after Death Shido raises the Darkness Barrier, Zanya is all on his own to save the day, or is he? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ニャニャ? 長靴を履いたケットシー!
Meow, Meow! Cait Sith in Boots!
Nyanya? Nagagutsu o Haita Cait Sith!
episode.summary: Gao gets more than he bargained for while responding to a sighting of an illegal monster at Castle. Death Shido continues his hunt for Lord Tenbu and, with a new Hundred Demon in his pocket, accepts a challenge to fight Gao. But who is Gao’s new Buddy? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 忍び寄る魔剣士! 奪われた天武!!
The Demon Swordsman Draws Closer! Tenbu Abducted!
Shinobiyoru Makenshi! Ubawareta Tenbu!!
episode.summary: Tired of Shido’s incompetence, Ikazuchi calls on the mighty Dekalfar Demon Swordsman Heim to lead the charge on stealing Tenbu away from Gao. Is Gao prepared to face the craftiest Hundred Demon yet? And who is this civilian hunting down illegal monsters? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 星合体! スタードラゴンワールド!!
Crossnize! Star Dragon World!
Hoshi Gattai! Star Dragon World!!
episode.summary: Gao and Drum are surprised when they discover who Tasuku’s been training with in Dragon World. Tasuku must conquer some personal demons to find his true self, and untap his true power. The Hundred Demon Heim agrees to relinquish Lord Tenbu for a cost. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: チェスト! 仲間を捜してジウン万年!!
Hoo-hah! A Hundred Thousand Ziun Years in Search of Friends!
Chest! Nakama o Sagashite Ziun Mannen!!
episode.summary: Master Ikazuchi wants to add a new powerful monster to his menu, and he sends Shido off in hot pursuit! Zanya is the victim of mistaken identity. And things go awry in the Darkness Barrier when Gao realizes he left something valuable at home. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さすらいの百鬼ハンター
The Wandering Hundred Demons` Hunter!
Sasurai no Hyaku Oni Hunter
episode.summary: The Hundred Demons Hunter is back and he gets tangled up in Death Shido’s latest plan. The Buddy Police has their eye on the rogue biker as well and Gao is sent in to serve and protect. Wait till you see his unique ability that has Shido tied up in knots? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 勝ち抜け! 一〇二四連戦!!
Win and Advance! 1024 Consecutive Fights!
Kachinuke! Ichi Rei Ni Yon Rensen!!
episode.summary: Gao is forced to fight for his freedom when he finds himself in a pressing engagement with Suzuha Amanosuzu. And just when he thinks a new dawn has spared him from further competition, Death Shido drags him back into their familiar Buddyfight dance. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 百鬼夜行! 爆雷の恐怖!!
Parade of Hundred Demons! Terror of the Thunder Mine!
Hyakkiyakou! Bakurai no Kyoufu!!
episode.summary: When the game between Gao and Death Shido ends, a vile enemy appears and throws down the gauntlet of evil! Even Asmodai’s sacrifice isn’t enough to conquer this overwhelming threat. Luckily, a familiar face arrives to save the day, but is it too late? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 全てを喰らう獣! ヤミゲドウ!!
Yamigedo! The Fiend That Devours All!
Subete o Kurau Shishi! Yamigedou!!
episode.summary: Just before Yamigedo swoops in for an all-out attack, Count Dawn reveals some dark truths to the gang about himself and Ikazuchi. And with Tenbu’s existence on the line as the monster’s dinner prize, Gramps makes a deal he might not live to regret. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ナノマシン忍者対決! 白夜VS月影!!
Nanomachine Ninja Showdown! Byakuya vs. Tsukikage!
Nano Machine Ninja Taiketsu! Byakuya vs Tsukikage!!
episode.summary: Gao is forced to take a leave from the Buddy Police, and struggles in his new role as the Buddy of an Omni Lord. Zanya opens a can of worms in the form of a Buddy Rare card, and finds himself fighting against Tsukikage by a visitor from Katana World. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: おいらがヒーロー! ジャスティス・ドラム!!
I`m the Hero! Justice Drum!
Oira ga Hero! Justice Drum!!
episode.summary: The Hundred Demons Hunter is back, and he’s coming after Gao. But fresh off his defeat to Ikazuchi where he lost Gramps Tenbu, is Gao up for the challenge? Maybe an energy boost from Drum and a special gift from Tasuku will help get him back on his game. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: タスク潜入! バディファイトクラブ!!
Tasuku Undercover! Buddy Fight Club!!
Tasuku Sennyuu! Buddy Fight Club!!
episode.summary: The continued search for the Omni Lords leads Tasuku deep undercover where he encounters the dark forces behind the mysterious Buddyfight club. Once there, he is reunited with a familiar foe and makes a new one. Will he risk it all for the greater good?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 切り捨て御免! 死ヶ峰無限剣[インフィニティ・デスクレスト]!!
Punishment for Disrespect! Infinite Death Crest!
Kirisute Gomen! Infinity Death Crest!!
episode.summary: Drum’s inability to master his newfound Omni Lord powers forces Gao to miss out on further Buddy Police duties. But Tetsuya is happy to step in to face off against a mysterious traveller from Hero World whose intentions seem dubious at best. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 鬼神合体! 剛刃丸!!
Ghoul Deity Combine! Gojinmaru!
Kijin Gattai! Tsuyoshi wa Maru!!
episode.summary: Zanya’s Omni Lord search takes him on an unexpected journey of self-growth, where he is confronted with the reality of his quest and position as a Buddy Police officer. Gao has a startling discovery of his own, which threatens his Buddyfighting career. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 哀しみの地王! 大地に捧ぐ鎮魂歌!!
Tragic Earth Lord! A Requiem for Daichi!
Kanashimi no Chi-ou! Daichi ni Sasagu Chinkonka!!
episode.summary: Losing Tenbu has had a severe effect on Gao, and he can’t use Dragon World decks until he deals with it. Count Dawn experiences some emotional turmoil of his own. When long repressed pain from the loss of a friend resurfaces, he must face it head on. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 永遠の別れ! 超星護[スター・ガーディアン]ジャックナイフ!!
Farewell Star Guardian Jackknife!
Eien no Wakare! Star Guardian Jackknife!!
episode.summary: As Tasuku prepares for his showdown with Suzaku Kenran, Jack falls ill and no one knows why! The enigmatic leader of Buddyfight Club reveals some startling surprises, and offers Tasuku an ultimatum. How will the Buddy Cop handle such a moral dilemma? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 外道奥義 召雷暴神立!!
Unorthodox Arts Shoraiabare Kandaichi!
Gedou Ougi Shoraiabare Kandaichi!!
episode.summary: Tasuku and the Buddy Police are in hot pursuit of Sophia Sakharov. A hungry, and weakening Ikazuchi challenges Gao to a Buddyfight. But unable to use his Dragon World Deck, he must stand by and watch another friend suffer a punishing fate in his place. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激突! ヒーローVSダークヒーロー!!
A Battle of Heroes!
Gekitotsu! Hero vs Dark Hero!!
episode.summary: The mysterious Hero World fighter Shigamine steals an Omni Lord’s emblem, but when Zanya traps him in a Buddy Police Barrier Gao shows up to save the day. Will he be able to rise to the occasion, or will his emotional pain set him back even further? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 炎王降臨! 復活のバーンノヴァ!!
Descent of the Fire Lord! Burn Nova Revived!
Honoo-ou Kourin! Fukkatsu no Burn Nova!!
episode.summary: Count Dawn lifts Drum’s leave to find out if Dragon Kid Ricky is really an Omni Lord. But before he can get an answer to this long-kept secret, the Hundred Demons Hunter is challenged to a Buddyfight in the darkness barrier. Will he go from zero to hero? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さらば, バディファイト
Farewell Buddyfight!
Saraba, Buddyfight
episode.summary: Crippled by his inability to use Dragon World Decks, Gao quits Buddyfight, the Buddy Police, and bids farewell to Drum, giving his Buddy to Tasuku. But when Yamigedo and Ikazuchi beeline for Gao’s pad to devour him, will he have a change of heart? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ルミナイズ! 超竜五角陣!!
Luminize! Super Dragon Fifth Omni Formation!!
Luminize! Chouryuu Go Kakujin!!
episode.summary: Gao is frustrated by Count Dawn`s refusal to rescue Noboru before the Omni Lords are all assembled. Meanwhile, the Fifth Omni Cavalry Dragons won`t accept Drum as their leader. Can Gao convince them to join in a final assault on Ikazuchi`s secret lair? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 鈴羽赤面! タイガーからの果し状!!
Suzuha Blushes! A Love Letter from Tiger!!
Suzu wa Sekimen! Tiger kara no Hatashijou!!
episode.summary: Zanya is shocked to hear that Jin is missing after receiving a mysterious summons. Suzuha receives a letter from the same sender, who reveals himself to be Noboru and challenges her to a Buddyfight. The changes in Noboru surprise friend and foe alike. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 霧の神話
Legend of the Mist
Kiri no Shinwa
episode.summary: While investigating some Omni Lord sightings, Gao encounters some familiar faces. But complications arise when Shido and Sophia arrive, seeking to capture the Omni Lord for themselves. In all the chaos, Kiri is forced to face a secret from his past. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: テツヤ絶句! 裏切りの魔王!!
Tetsuya Speechless! The Demon Lord`s Betrayal
Tetsuya Zekku! Uragiri no Maou!!
episode.summary: Tetsuya`s joy at meeting his favorite rock band fades when the lead singer, Rucy, insults Asmodai and calls him a traitor. As Rucy and Asmodai`s shared past comes to light and Asmodai prepares to leave this world, Tetsuya`s faith in Asmodai is tested. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: テツヤ号泣! 魔王異次元に消ゆ!!
Tetsuya Weeps!The Demon Lord vanishes in the Void!
Tetsuya Goukyuu! Maou Ijigen ni Shouyu!!
episode.summary: Rucy and Tetsuya join Asmodai in his desperate attempt to take back the part of him that Yamigedo devoured. But nobody is prepared for what they see in the belly of the beast. Meanwhile, Tiger continues his relentless battles against top Buddyfighters. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ミセリア初陣! 友情は時をこえて!!
Miserea`s First Battle! Friendship Through the Ages!
Miserea Uijin! Yuujou wa Toki o Koete!!
episode.summary: Shido heads to Cho-Hodaka to capture an Omni Lord, accompanied by the villainous Davide. Meanwhile, Kiri struggles to deal with the painful burden of his sad memories. He faces his old nemesis, hoping for closure and inner peace. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: さらわれたドラム! 牙王VS死ヶ峰!!
Drum Kidnapped! Gao vs. Shigamine!
Sarawareta Drum! Gao vs Shigamine!!
episode.summary: Light Rim Alliot, the last of the Fifth Omni Cavalry Dragons, thinks Drum`s just riding on his father`s coattails. But when Shigamine kidnaps Drum and tries to take his Omni Lord emblem, everyone learns something about honor and self-worth. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ジャックを救え! タスク, 絶望の未来へ!!
Save Jack! Tasuku Goes to the Future of Despair!
Jack o Sukue! Tasuku, Zetsubou no Mirai e!!
episode.summary: Tasuku is filled with hope when Paruko receives a transmission from Jack, last seen travelling to the future Star Dragon World. Sophia claims she can help Tasuku travel to the future and reunite with his Buddy. How far will Tasuku go to rescue Jack? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 希望の星! 超光星護ジャックナイフ "アステール"!!
Star of Hope! Radiant Guardian, Jackknife "Aster"!!
Kibou no Hoshi! Chou Hikari Hoshi Mamoru Jackknife "Aster"!!
episode.summary: Trapped in a dark future created by Variable Cord`s selfish actions, Tasuku must find a way to heal Jack and time-travel home. Meanwhile, Sophia finds herself captured by the future version of Gratos. Can Tasuku find hope and save the future? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ロウガVS八角神王 グランガデス!
Rouga vs. Eighth Omni Deity Lord, Grangadez!
Rouga vs Hakkakushin-ou Grangadez!
episode.summary: Gratos tests Sophia`s loyalty by ordering her to capture Grangadez. Her incomplete summoning of Grangadez causes the Omni Lord to go on a rampage. When Kiri finds himself affected by Grangadez`s rage, Rouga is forced to face both Omni Lords in combat. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 復活のイカヅチ! 未門家襲撃!!
Ikazuchi`s Return! Mikado Family Under Attack!!
Fukkatsu no Ikazuchi! Mikado-ke Shuugeki!!
episode.summary: Gao`s mom returns from America and is attacked by Ikazuchi, who wants a rematch with Gao. Gratos finds a new use for Ikazuchi and sends Noboru to capture him. As Gao and Noboru face off in a Buddyfight, the truth about Ikazuchi`s tragic past is revealed. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 角王集結! ヤミゲドウ封印!!
Omni Lords Assemble! Seal Yamigedo!
Kaku-ou Shuuketsu! Yamigedou Fuuin!!
episode.summary: The eight Omni Lords are ready to face Yamigedo. They travel to the Moon to seal him, but are interrupted by the eight Inverse Omni Lords. As Yamigedo bursts out of his cocoon and attacks, Gratos`s conquest of the Earth begins. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決戦!闇荒御魂 オオヤミゲドウ!!
Final Battle! Specter of Darkness Wasteland, O-Yamigedo!
Kessen! Yami Aramitama Ooyamigedou!!
episode.summary: Trapped inside O-Yamigedo as he hurtles towards Earth, the Omni Lords battle their clones, the evil Inverse Omni Lords. On Earth, humanity takes shelter as Ikazuchi faces off against Gratos in a Buddyfight to prove who is worthy of commanding the monster. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 超決戦! 超渋谷大崩壊!!
Super Final Battle! Cho-Shibuya Destroyed!
Choukessen! Chou Shibuya Daihoukai!!
episode.summary: Ikazuchi tries to pacify O-Yamigedo while the Omni Lords seal the creature. Although Gratos is gone, O-Yamigedo absorbs his powers and begins to control the Inverse Fiends, as well as Ikazuchi. Gao engages in a desperate Buddyfight to save him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 地球が石になる日!
The Day the Earth Turned to Stone!
Chikyuu ga Ishi ni Naruhi!
episode.summary: Yamigedo`s cocoon continues to spread strange threads that petrify all that they touch. When the Defense Forces and Buddy Police are unable to deal with this menace, the Omni Lords and their buddies attempt an underground infiltration of Yamigedo`s lair. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 衝突する星合体! ジャックVS裏角王!!
Jack vs. Inverse Omni Lord!
Shoutotsu Suru Hoshigattai! Jack vs Ura Kaku-ou!!
episode.summary: Jack and Tasuku face their first Inverse Fiend opponent, Sophia. Knowing that the loser of the battle will be turned to stone, Jack is gripped by the fear of losing Tasuku. Meanwhile, Sophia`s loyalty to Kyoya forces Yamigedo to take over her body. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: タッグマッチ? 斬夜・テツヤVSジン・鈴羽!!
Tag Match? Zanya and Tetsuya versus Jin and Suzuha!
Tag Match? Zanya Tetsuya vs Jin Suzuha!!
episode.summary: Zanya and Tetsuya face the Inverse Fiend Horde in their first ever tag match, but Zanya isn`t surethat his partner`s up to the task. Faced with twice the number of Inverse Omni Lords, he soon learnsthat team work is the key to victory. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: なななんと! 牙王VSオカダ!?
Wh-Wh-What`s this? Gao vs. Okada?
Nanananto! Gao s Okada!?
episode.summary: Gao briefly reunites with Ikazuchi before his next challenge: a Buddyfight against professional wrestling champion Kazuchika Okada. The Fifth Omni Cavalry Dragons struggle as they face Crazed Tenbu. Can they really fight their Lord Tenbu`s double? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 曲者揃い! キリ・ロウガVSノボル・ダビデ!!
Odd Couples! Kiri and Rouga versus Noboru and Davide!
Kusemono Soroi! Kiri Rouga vs Noboru Davide!!
episode.summary: Kiri and Rouga`s opposing personalities lead to friction. Still bitter over his defeat at Kiri`s hands, Davide suggests a tag match. Much to Noboru`s annoyance, Kiri`s evil double, Dark Miserea joins the fight and taunts Kiri, hoping to break his heart. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 炎王対決! バーンノヴァVSヴェノムノヴァ!!
Fire Lord Showdown! Burn Nova versus Venom Nova!
Honoo-ou Taiketsu! Burn Nova vs Venom Nova!!
episode.summary: Ban and Genma face off in a manly showdown. Neginoyama is cornered by Shigamine, who reveals the surprising truth about Hero World and the ninth Omni Lord. Kazane and Kemura`s fight takes a disastrous turn, spurring Captain Answer into action. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: キャプテン・アンサー"オーバーロード"の反逆!!
Captain Answer Overlord`s Rebellion!
Captain Answer "Overloard" no Hangyaku!!
episode.summary: Shigamine surprises everyone by teaming up with Kazane to battle Kemura and an evil Captain Answer. Kazane struggles with her guilt, while Shigamine learns what it truly means to be a hero. Tasuku uncovers the truth about Suzaku, Sophia, and Kyoya Gaen. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: カードの行方! 祠堂怒りのDEATH死ンフォニー!!
Where the Cards Went! Shido`s Death Symphony of Rage!
Card no Yukue! Shidou Ikari no Death Symphony!!
episode.summary: Tasuku and Gao confront Suzaku over his betrayal, while Sophia collects the Inverse Omni Lord cards. Shido steals one of the cards, and Sophia manipulates him into battling Gratos with the card as the stakes. Meanwhile, Kyoya puts his plan into motion. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最大最悪最強! ヒャクガンヤミゲドウ!!
The Biggest! The Baddest! The Strongest! Hyakugan Yamigedo!
Saidai Saiaku Saikyou! Hyakugan Yamigedou!!
episode.summary: Kyoya and Sophia are unable to control Yamigedo. As Yamigedo evolves into a final form, Ikazuchi and Tasuku team up to defeat the monster and save everyone. Yamigedo teleports to the future, and faces Ikazuchi in a battle for the world. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 世界を救え! 絶望のハンドレッド!!
Save the World! A Hundred Despairs!
Sekai o Sukue! Zetsubou no Hundred!!
episode.summary: Hyakugan Yamigedo`s powerful abilities prove to be too much for Ikazuchi. As all seems lost, Tasuku receives aid from an unexpected ally: Kyoya and Suzaku. Gao is brought to the distant future to battle Hyakugan Yamigedo over the fate of humanity. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 限界のその先へ! 無双奥義 角王∞弾!!
Beyond the Limit! Unparalleled Arts, Omni Lord Infinity Burst!
Genkai no Sono Saki e! Musou Ougi Kaku-ou Dan!!
episode.summary: The battle against Yamigedo reaches its climax as Gao faces his greatest challenge yet. Hyakugan Yamigedo seems to be indestructible, but Gao still has a secret weapon: the card that his one-time foe, Ikazuchi, has given him. Source: crunchyroll
